text: Ddan akked wayen xedmen ccwaîen mgal tagelda n Sliman. Sliman ur ijhil. Maca ccwaîen jehlen. Sseêfaven i medden ssêur, akked wayen id irsen, di Babil, ar lmalayek Harut akked Marut. Ur sselmaden yiwen, mebla ma nnan: "nekwni n$ewwu kan, ur jehhel"! ÊÊÊËefven, $uôsen, amek ara ssemfaôaqen argaz akked tmeîîut is. Ur îîurun yiwen syis, siwa ma Ib$a Öebbi. ÊÊÊËefven ara ten ivuôôen, ur ten ineffaâ. Ni$ éôan ar win i p iu$en, ur as illi umur di laxeôt. War ccekk, ard ucmit wayen is zzenzen leôwaê nnsen, lemmer éôin
